classes.name: ExampleClass
classes.description:
these meta comments can have multiple lines, so becareful when parsing themClasses can also have meta comments
these comments can have multiple lines as well as field description
as show below

fields.name: field1
fields.description: this is a private field of type string

fields.name: field2
fields.description: this is an optional field that is public and of type number

fields.name: field3
fields.description: this field can be either boolean or number

fields.name: method1
fields.description:
this is a method that takes
a string and a number and returns nil, also these field descriptions can have multiple lines

fields.name: someField
fields.description: this is a static field of type string for the class

functions.name: method1
functions.description:
This is a documented function with meta comments
This is a second line of the description for this function.

parameters.name: param1
parameters.description: this is the first parameter of type string for this function

parameters.name: param2
parameters.description: this is the second parameter of type ExampleClass for this function

classes.name: ENUM
classes.description: this is an enum, which sould be represented as class

fields.name: VALUE2
fields.description: this is the second value of the enum, with an explicit type
